{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient's symptoms of dry, scaly skin that is worse in winter and better in summer, along with the absence of itching, redness, or discharge, suggest a non-inflammatory skin condition. This condition also often presents with multiple papular elevations at the base of hair follicles and darkening of the palmar and plantar creases.
